Room.Name: Underground Cavern
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking through the dark, underground caverns beneath the glacier.
Room.LongDescription: To the south, you can see the other side of the cliff which overlooks the Dennanl Abyss. The rope bridge which would normally allow you to cross the abyss in relative safety appears to be cut, and hangs limply on the other side of the cavern. The cliff you are on appears to be lower than the cliff on the other side, suggesting the caverns head deeper into the ground.
